Description: This task involves estimating the size of each of the up to 5 RECIST target lesions described in the radiology report, with the size given in millimeters. For lymph nodes, the short axis should be reported. If less than 5 lesions are described, the remaining lesion sizes should be set to 0.

reasoning.description: The thought process leading to the final answer.

lesion_1.description: The estimated size of the first RECIST target lesion in millimeters. If not described, set to 0.

lesion_2.description: The estimated size of the second RECIST target lesion in millimeters. If not described, set to 0.

lesion_3.description: The estimated size of the third RECIST target lesion in millimeters. If not described, set to 0.

lesion_4.description: The estimated size of the fourth RECIST target lesion in millimeters. If not described, set to 0.

lesion_5.description: The estimated size of the fifth RECIST target lesion in millimeters. If not described, set to 0.
